snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio has signaled in the last few days that he sees some compromise as an acceptable outcome to the long fight to save the Long Island College Hospital in Cobble Hill.
abstract: All four remaining bidders for troubled Long Island College Hospital say that hospital is not viable in present form and propose turning Cobble Hill, Brooklyn, property into combination of housing and medical care; Mayor Bill de Blasio says compromise may be acceptable outcome to long fight to save the facility.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio has signaled in the last few days that he sees some compromise as an acceptable outcome to the long fight to save the Long Island College Hospital in Cobble Hill.

headline.main: Bidders’ Plans for Brooklyn Hospital Include Medical and Housing Needs
headline.print_headline: Bidders’ Plans for Brooklyn Hospital Include Medical and Housing Needs
